coreDetails.title: Senior Software Engineer
coreDetails.jobSummary: Join our team to lead the development of our next-generation cloud platform, directly impacting millions of users.

keyObjectives.objective: Improve API latency by 20% in Q3

experience.description: Experience building and maintaining high-traffic, distributed systems.

companyContext.culture: We value collaboration, continuous learning, and a healthy work-life balance.
companyContext.growthOpportunities: This role has a clear path to a Principal Engineer position. We offer a $5,000 annual learning stipend.

interviewFlow.objective: Evaluate the candidate's system design skills and problem-solving approach.

questions.questionText: Design a scalable URL shortening service.
What trade-offs would you consider between consistency and availability in microservices?

interviewFlow.objective: Assess alignment with company values and interpersonal communication.

questions.questionText: Tell me about a time you had a conflict in a team. How did you resolve it?
How do you prioritize learning new technologies with delivering current responsibilities?

interviewGuidance.extraNotes: Each interview stage should progress logically and allow the agent to escalate or de-escalate based on candidate performance.
